divs: Sighting Details it came down the valley of the river (momongahela river)visible in line . Could see very well. Could not of been the only person to see it that night wonder why no one has said anything . Never seen anything on ufo's or unexplained objects on this. I know what I saw My husband says tell someone. So I lived at southwestern pa in octber (1980) (name deleted)fg It was egg sphere lookinging object surrounmded by a cylinder sphere bright uluminous all over very visible
Summary: cylinder with a shere looking top bright ulumianted all over
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Charleroi
There were no other sightings in Charleroi on or around October 31st 1980
